name: HarryRabby 2 Simple Rounding FREE
description:
Looking to test your kid’s basic math skills? We have what you need here! This special series of  HarryRabby 2 includes products for learning different elementary/intermediate math topics.

The Math Learning editions are action packed math games with levels of fun and excitement. Having accessibility in mind, special display and control features are available for low vision gamers. Simple but challenging gameplay, with mobile touch screen support, the games can be played on mobile devices as well as on desktop computers.

The math questions are specifically made for elementary and intermediate learners. Player clicks or touches on the correct answer to a math question in order to allow HarryRabby to land safely and proceed to the next level. The math questions are generated randomly. The full versions have 5 difficulty levels based on value of the correct answers. The Free versions have just one difficulty level for you to try out.

This game provides Simple Rounding questions. 

Many game elements are adjustable, such as object moving speed and color mode (high contrast, brightness, grayscale, B&W, inversed display…etc).
